resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1974</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Project: Learning Disabilities</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Projekt: Erlernenunfähigkeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Projet : Incapacités D'Étude</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Projeto: Inabilidades De Aprendizagem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Progetto: Inabilità Imparanti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόγραμμα: Μαθησιακές δυσκολίες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Proyecto: Inhabilidades Que aprenden</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a guide for an Advanced English student project where the students carry out research on learning disabilities . The project includes written and oral presentations. Assessment rubrics, time schedule , checklist and reflection forms are provided.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oral expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning disabilities</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine Anleitung für ein 
hochentwickeltes englisches Kursteilnehmerprojekt, in dem die 
Kursteilnehmer Forschung auf erlernenunfähigkeit durchführen. 
Das Projekt schließt die geschriebenen und Munddarstellungen 
ein. Einschätzung Rubriken, Zeitplan, Checkliste und Reflexion 
Formulare werden zur Verfügung gestellt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un guide pour un projet anglais avançé 
d'étudiant où les étudiants effectuent la recherche sur des 
incapacités d'étude. Le projet inclut des présentations 
écrites et orales. Des rubriques d'évaluation, le calendrier, 
la liste de contrôle et les formes de réflexion sont fournis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma guia para um projeto inglês avançado
do estudante onde os estudantes realizem a pesquisa sobre inabilidades
de aprendizagem. O projeto inclui apresentações escritas e 
orais. Os rubrics da avaliação, a programação de tempo, a 
lista de verificação e os formulários da reflexão são fornecidos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è una guida per un progetto inglese avanzato
dell'allievo dove gli allievi effettuano la ricerca sulle inabilità 
imparanti. Il progetto include le presentazioni scritte ed 
orali. Le rubriche di valutazione, i tempi previsti, la lista di
controllo e le forme di riflessione sono forniti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένας οδηγός για ένα προηγμένο αγγλικό 
πρόγραμμα σπουδαστών όπου οι σπουδαστές διεξάγουν την έρευνα για
τις μαθησιακές δυσκολίες. Το πρόγραμμα περιλαμβάνει τις 
γραπτές και προφορικές παρουσιάσεις. Οι μορφές ρουμπρικών 
αξιολόγησης, χρονικού προγράμματος, πινάκων ελέγχου και 
αντανάκλασης παρέχονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una guía para un proyecto inglés 
avanzado del estudiante donde los estudiantes realizan la 
investigación sobre inhabilidades que aprenden. El proyecto 
incluye presentaciones escritas y orales. Se proporcionan las 
rúbricas del gravamen, el horario de tiempo, la lista de 
comprobación y las formas de la reflexión.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mundausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erlernenunfähigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Compréhension de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">incapacités d'étude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compreensão da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">inabilidades de aprendizagem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Comprensione della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">inabilità imparanti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατανόηση ανάγνωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προφορική έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαθησιακές δυσκολίες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Comprensión de la lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">inhabilidades que aprenden</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
